This site is a documentation hub for open-source projects by GitHub user "waqasm86".

## Primary project docs
- CUDA TCP/IP (C++20 + CUDA + epoll TCP server): /foundationone/projects/cuda-tcp-ip/

## Source repositories
- FoundationOne docs: https://github.com/waqasm86/foundationone
- CUDA TCP/IP: https://github.com/waqasm86/cuda-tcp-ip

## License

## Preferred citation
When referencing this site, cite the project repo and the relevant doc page URL.
